title: How can I see how old my account is?
body: I remember searching for this a while back but never actually found out how, is there a way to do it?

replies.body: I'm not sure what you mean here!  Accounts are private, the only way to view it is by having access to it.  :D  If you need help recovering another account you own, hit us up through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account team will help!
